translation.en: We found this old church, and we decided to party in it,
and my roommate wanted to play truth or dare, so we did.
translation.es: y mi amiga quería jugar verdad o reto.

translation.en: But when we got home, the game, it just kept going.
translation.es: Pero cuando llegamos a casa, el juego siguió.

translation.en: My roommate died first, and then the other ones and--
translation.es: Mi amiga murió primero, luego los demás...

translation.en: How is this possible?
I wish I knew.
I thought this was some kind of karmic payback for Sam trashing the place, you know?
translation.es: Es una venganza kármica por los destrozos de Sam.

translation.en: Sam?
Uh, yeah, Sam. He was one of my friends.
translation.es: Sí, Sam. Era uno de mis amigos.

translation.en: He got really drunk, and he just started breaking stuff.
translation.es: Se emborrachó y empezó a romper cosas.

translation.en: I don't know. We were all being idiots. I don't...
translation.es: No sé. Nos portamos como idiotas. No...

translation.en: Our friend just had a turn in the game. It wouldn't let her pick truth. Do you know why?
translation.es: A mi amiga le tocó. No pudo escoger verdad. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: It's how we played. We called it two truths and a dare.
translation.es: Porque jugamos dos verdades y un reto.

translation.en: If two people pick truth in a row, then the next person had to do a dare.
translation.es: Si dos escogen verdad, siempre sigue un reto.

translation.en: Thought it was more fun that way.
More fun?
Your asshole buddy gave us a death sentence.
translation.es: El imbécil de tu amigo nos sentenció a muerte.

translation.en: Any more super dangerous rules you wanna tell us about?
Easy, Pen.
He told me he was dared to find a new group to play.
translation.es: Lo retaron a encontrar otro grupo que jugara.

translation.en: And that it had to be at the mission. He didn't have a choice, you know?
translation.es: Y tenía que ser en la misión. No tenía opción.

translation.en: Of course he did.
Okay, so where is Carter now?
I haven't talked to him since he went back to Mexico.
translation.es: No hablé con él desde que regresó a México.

translation.en: I thought that when he got a new group to play, that we would be out.
translation.es: Pensé que un grupo nuevo nos sacaría a nosotros.

translation.en: I can't believe he only got five of you to play.
If he would've gotten more,
then I would've had a longer time before I had to go again.
translation.es: yo habría tenido más tiempo antes de tener que volver a jugar.

translation.en: You got another turn?
Okay. It's time to go, guys.
Is this why you're telling us the truth?
No. I, uh... I picked dare.
Markie's right. Let's get out of here.
Okay, we're leaving. Come on, Olivia.
I am so sorry, Olivia.
How did you know my name when I got here?
I didn't put it in the message.
translation.es: No lo puse en el mensaje.

translation.en: - No! -
- No! - Pen!
Brad! No! No!
- Hold her down! - I have to kill Olivia!
Stop moving.
What the...
No! No!
Oh, shit.
What was she thinking?
It wasn't her.
Something took over like she was possessed.
She didn't finish her dare.
Like Ronnie. This is what happens.
translation.es: Como Ronnie. Esto es lo que pasa.

translation.en: So what do we do?
We tell the truth.
She was erratic, said she had to kill me.
translation.es: Desvariaba. Dijo que tenía que matarme.

translation.en: Then Penelope pushed me out of the way. She shot her and then turned the gun on herself.
translation.es: Penélope me empujó, Giselle la mató y se suicidó.

translation.en: Were you aware that Giselle Hammond was wanted for murder? Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Sabías que estaba acusada de asesinato? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, we thought that she knew someone that we were looking for.
translation.es: Pero conocía a alguien que buscábamos.

translation.en: A guy that we met in Mexico, his name was Carter.
You don't know his last name?
No.
Any of these people look like him?
translation.es: ¿Alguno de ellos se parece a él?

translation.en: No, who are they?
Five of Giselle Hammond's friends. All deceased.
translation.es: Cinco amigos de Giselle Hammond. Todos fallecidos.

translation.en: Three suicides, two accidental deaths. All in three weeks.
translation.es: Tres suicidios, dos accidentes. Todo en tres semanas.

translation.en: And now you've lost two friends.
translation.es: Y ahora tú perdiste dos amigos.

translation.en: I don't believe in coincidences, Olivia.
I think this is all connected. If you know how, you need to tell me.
translation.es: Creo que todo está conectado. Si sabes cómo, dime.

translation.en: No, I promise.
If I did know, I would.
I hope so.
We'll be in touch.
Don't take any more vacations.
That did not go well.
We told them the truth.
- As much as we could. - Guys,
the cops should be the least of our concerns.
translation.es: la policía es lo de menos.

translation.en: I mean, Penelope's dead, and Giselle gave us nothing.
translation.es: Digo, Penélope murió, y Giselle no nos dijo nada.

translation.en: She did say a new game had to start at the mission.
translation.es: Dijo que los juegos empiezan en la misión.

translation.en: That place has to be the key.
translation.es: Ese lugar debe ser la clave.

translation.en: Brad.
Catch up with you guys later.
No, we shouldn't split up.
No, it's okay. My turn's not for a while.
translation.es: No me tocará en un rato.

translation.en: I'll deal with my father. You deal with finding the mission.
translation.es: Yo me encargaré de mi papá, ustedes busquen la misión.

translation.en: Come on.
I think it was built in 1896.
Yeah, that really narrows it down.
It's a start.
Oh, shit. I gotta grab my charger.
I think you left your bag in my room.
translation.es: Dejaste tu bolso en mi cuarto.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - What?
Check this out.
It says there was a massacre a few weeks later.
translation.es: Dice que hubo una masacre unas semanas después.

translation.en: Only one survivor lives in the area. Inez Reyes, 19.
translation.es: Solo una sobreviviente vive en la zona. Inez Reyes, de 19 años.

translation.en: Truth or dare.
Where is she? Liv!
Hey! Hey!
Olivia! Are you okay?
Where am I?
- Where am I? - What the hell are you...
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Are you okay?
Was that your turn?
Hey! Hey! Come back! Come back!
Olivia, what did he say?
He dared me to sleep with Lucas.
translation.es: Me retó a acostarme con Lucas.

translation.en: Why would you pick dare?
Because of what Giselle said.
If I picked truth, I was just forcing someone else to pick dare.
translation.es: Si escogía verdad, hubiera forzado a otro a escoger reto.

translation.en: How noble.
Markie, I didn't know that's what it would ask.
translation.es: Markie, no sabía que me iba a pedir eso.

translation.en: I don't think he knew where he was.
- Are you guys okay? - Yeah, I'm perfect.
Well, hey, hey! Where are you going?
Anywhere but here.
What is going on?
Why don't you ask Olivia?
Will you please tell me what the hell is going on?
I got my turn.
Yeah, and?
Whoa. Hey, no. What are we doing?
Oh, this is the dare.
I'm sorry.
Why didn't you pick truth?
I told Markie it was so that you guys wouldn't have to,
translation.es: Dije que para que no les tocara reto,

translation.en: but that was a lie.
I chose dare because there is something that I can never tell Markie,
translation.es: Hay algo que no le puedo decir a Markie

translation.en: and I'm really afraid the game's gonna make me do it.
translation.es: y me aterra que el juego me obligue.

translation.en: It can't be that bad.
You have no idea.
- - What?
No, you're just doing this because of the dare.
translation.es: No, vas a hacer esto por el reto.

translation.en: Because you have to.
No, you have to.
I don't.
Look at me.
Truth or dare?
Truth or dare?
Truth!
Who are you truly in love with?
I care about you. I do.
I'm in love with Markie.
Liv, I'm sorry. It was the game.
No, it was the truth.
Roy Cameron, 45 years old, attempts to make dinner.
translation.es: Roy Cameron, de 45 años, trata de hacer la cena.

translation.en: Take one.
Whoa. A little faith, please?
translation.es: Un poco de fe, por favor.

translation.en: Nobody makes a steak like your old man.
translation.es: Nadie hace mejores filetes que yo.

translation.en: Wait. Dad, I'm pescatarian now.
I know, honey.
Dad?
I miss you so much.
I miss you, too.
There's something that I've been dying to ask you.
translation.es: Hay algo que me muero por preguntarte.

translation.en: No.
- She's not answering. - Wait.
Come here. Look at this.
There's no number, but she lives in Tijuana. That's less than three hours away.
translation.es: No hay un número, pero vive en Tijuana. Está a menos de tres horas.

translation.en: Who is she?
She's someone who might be able to help us.
Come on.
Come on, sweetheart.
Time to pick.
Truth.
The gun I used to kill myself,
translation.es: La pistola que usé para matarme...

translation.en: why do you keep it?
Sometimes, I think about using it.
Maybe you should get it.
I'm worried about Markie.
I wish we would have found her before we left.
translation.es: Lástima que no la encontramos antes de irnos.

translation.en: Well, she doesn't want to speak to me right now, so there's nothing we can do.
translation.es: No quiere hablar conmigo. No había nada que hacer.

translation.en: You know that secret that you're keeping from her?
translation.es: El secreto que no le quieres decir,

translation.en: Maybe if you got it out, the game couldn't use it against you.
translation.es: si lo revelas, quizá el juego no lo use en tu contra.

translation.en: No, no one can ever know.
Especially not Markie. It would kill her.
I'll try her again when we get there.
- Um... - Can I help you?
Sorry. Um, we're looking for Inez Reyes.
She's my grandmother. I watch after her.
translation.es: Es mi abuela. Yo la cuido.

translation.en: We were just wondering if we could speak to her.
She speaks to no one.
No, please.
Our friends are dying, just like hers did. We just need a few words.
translation.es: Nuestros amigos están muriendo como los de ella. Solo unas palabras.

translation.en: I will ask.
And if you could show her this.
Show her that we were at this mission
translation.es: Enséñale que estuvimos en esta misión

translation.en: and that half the people in this photo are now dead.
translation.es: y que la mitad de estas personas están muertas.

translation.en: Then maybe she'll talk to us.
She might see you. But she will not speak to you.
translation.es: Quizá los reciba. Pero no va a hablar con ustedes.

translation.en: She has not said a word in 50 years.
translation.es: No ha dicho nada en 50 años.

translation.en: Wait here.
She must have taken a vow of silence, right?
translation.es: Seguro hizo un voto de silencio, ¿no?

translation.en: She was 19 when her friends were butchered. Imagine what that did to her.
translation.es: Tenía 19 años cuando murieron sus amigos. Imagínate.

translation.en: I don't have to.
It's been over an hour.
translation.es: Ya pasó más de una hora.

translation.en: Yeah, for someone who doesn't speak, they seem to be doing a lot of talking.
translation.es: Para alguien que no dice nada, están hablando mucho.

translation.en: She will see you.
I'm sorry for the wait.
She has written something for you.
What is it?
She would not let me read it.
Thank you for seeing us, Ms. Reyes.
The mission was a convent where young women went to find God.
translation.es: La misión era un convento para mujeres jóvenes.

translation.en: We were girls, so we played silly games like hide- and- seek.
translation.es: Éramos niñas y jugábamos juegos tontos como a las escondidas.

translation.en: But the priest who ran the convent forced us to play his own game.
translation.es: Pero el cura del convento nos obligaba a jugar su juego.

translation.en: He let us hide, but then he took the one he found.
translation.es: Nos dejaba escondernos, pero tomaba a la que hallaba.

translation.en: His pleasure was our pain.
We suffered in silence.
Then one of the girls told a secret.
She knew spells that could call spirits,
so she summoned a demon named Calux.
translation.es: y llamó a un demonio llamado Calux,

translation.en: He possessed our game.
Possessed the game?
Demons possess people, places,
objects, even ideas.
Calux is a trickster.
That night, when the priest found his victim, she was possessed by Calux.
translation.es: Esa noche, la víctima del cura estaba poseída por Calux.

translation.en: She hid the priest's body in the mission
translation.es: Escondió el cuerpo del cura en la misión

translation.en: in pieces.
It took them a week to find his head.
translation.es: Tardaron una semana en hallar la cabeza.

translation.en: But Calux didn't want to stop. He made us keep playing.
translation.es: Pero Calux no quería parar. Nos hizo seguir jugando.

translation.en: Many of my sisters died.
Wait. How did you and the others escape?
The person who released the demon
translation.es: La persona que liberó al demonio

translation.en: can trap it with a simple ritual. But only by his own hand.
translation.es: puede atraparlo con un rito. Pero solo por su propia mano.

translation.en: Uh... This is the spell?
It's in Spanish.
The spell must be repeated seven times,
and a sacrifice must be placed in a pot sealed with wax.
translation.es: y pongan un sacrificio en una vasija sellada con cera.

translation.en: As long as the pot stays sealed in the mission,
translation.es: Mientras la vasija esté sellada en la misión,

translation.en: the door we opened for Calux will also be sealed.
translation.es: también estará sellada la puerta que le abrimos a Calux.

translation.en: Wait. I've seen that pot before.
Yeah.
Look. When I saw it, it was broken,
translation.es: Mira. Cuando la vi, estaba rota, tenía algo adentro

translation.en: and there was something inside it, and it smelled rotten.
translation.es: Mira. Cuando la vi, estaba rota, tenía algo adentro y olía a podrido.

translation.en: Whoever broke the pot will have to do the same.
translation.es: El que rompió la vasija tendrá que hacer lo mismo.

translation.en: What was it? The sacrifice?
It was you who summoned the demon?
It's been a few years since AP Spanish, but I think it says,
translation.es: Hace años que no tomo clases de español, pero creo que dice:

translation.en: I have called upon an evil.
Silence my voice so the evil is no more.
translation.es: Silencia mi voz para que el mal ya no exista.

translation.en: So when Carter and his friends broke the pot at the mission--
translation.es: Cuando Carter y su gente rompieron la vasija...

translation.en: The demon was freed and possessed their game of truth or dare.
translation.es: Liberaron al demonio que poseyó el juego.

translation.en: And we have to find whoever broke that pot.
Giselle said somebody named Sam trashed the place.
translation.es: Giselle dijo que un tal Sam destruyó el lugar.

translation.en: Yeah, and we have no idea who Sam is.
Or if he's even still alive.
And if we do find him...
What? Hi, Sam, do you mind cutting out your tongue
translation.es: ¿Qué? Hola, Sam. ¿No te cortas la lengua

translation.en: and sealing it in this lovely handmade pot?
translation.es: y la sellas en esta vasija de barro hecha a mano?

translation.en: I'll check Giselle's Facebook again, see if there's a Sam tagged.
translation.es: Voy a ver si Giselle etiquetó a Sam en Facebook.

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie? She's ignoring all my texts.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay de Markie? - Está ignorando mis mensajes.

translation.en: Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
translation.es: Le toca a ella. Voy a tratar de llamarla.

translation.en: Brad?
- Brad! It's your father. -
Since Penelope, he's been...
translation.es: Desde lo de Penélope, ha estado...

translation.en: I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
I'm gonna grab a coffee.
Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.es: Mira, hay unos rumores sobre el asesinato de tu amiga.

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
translation.es: Kranis no cree que sea un asunto sencillo.

translation.en: I know I don't need to ask this, but...
translation.es: Ya sé que no necesito preguntarte, pero...

translation.en: Is there something you're not telling us?
No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
translation.es: No, te lo juro. Todo lo que les dijimos es verdad.

translation.en: Markie, thank God!
Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong,
translation.es: Porque sé que Kranis se equivoca

translation.en: and I want you to know what's going on.
translation.es: y quiero que tú sepas qué pasa.

translation.en: Look, you don't have to worry. I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No dejaré que te pase nada.

translation.en: You're still my son, Brad.
You gonna get that?
Get what?
Truth or dare, Brad?
Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone. No, no, no. It's fine.
translation.es: - Necesitaba estar sola un rato. - No. Está bien.

translation.en: Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful.
translation.es: Pero ven lo antes posible. Y ten cuidado.

translation.en: Your turn's next.
I had my turn.
I chose truth.
So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
translation.es: Y si los dos escogieron verdad...

translation.en: You only have one choice.
You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
I dare you to steal his gun
translation.es: Te reto a robarle su pistola

translation.en: and make him beg for his life.
translation.es: y a hacer que te ruegue que no lo mates.

translation.en: Son?
Thank you, Dad,
for everything.
It's just, uh...
There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
translation.es: Necesito hacer una cosa, ojalá me puedas perdonar.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
- For your life. - The hell are you doing?
Beg for your life!
Brad, please put the gun down!
- Just do as I say... - You don't have to do this. ...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
- I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. - Listen. No!
That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
I guess you think I deserve this.
No! No.
Just beg!
Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
- What's that gonna prove, Brad? - Just beg!
And I'll put down the gun! - Beg-- -
No, no! No!
Brad!
Brad, no, no, no. No!
No! No!
Get a paramedic.
Brad! Brad! No, no, no.
Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
No! No!
I need a paramedic. Help!
I need a paramedic! Brad!
I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
I still need to talk to the detective.
- I shouldn't have picked truth. - No.
translation.es: - Hice mal en escoger verdad. - No.

translation.en: It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
translation.es: No fue culpa tuya. Yo escogí verdad.

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Brad alone. No, it wouldn't have mattered.
translation.es: - Estuvo mal dejar a Brad. - No hubiera importado.

translation.en: This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.es: El juego es muy listo. No lo estamos jugando.

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.es: Él juega con nosotros. No hay coincidencias.

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.es: Espera a que estemos vulnerables y nos pregunta.

translation.en: Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
And now it's your turn.
translation.es: Y ahora te toca a ti.

translation.en: Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
No, I didn't.
Truth or dare, Olivia?
Okay.
Okay, you have to pick truth.
Olivia, do it.
- Dare. - Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
translation.es: a que le digas a Markie tu secreto.

translation.en: What? What is it making you do?
Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
What?
I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.es: Estuve ahí el día que tu papá murió. Sé lo que pasó.

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.es: Tuve una pelea con mis padres, así que me fui a tu casa.

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.es: Tú no estabas, pero tu papá me dejó entrar.

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.es: Estaba bebiendo y me ofreció un trago. Lo acepté.

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.es: Tomamos un poco, y me dijo que lo habían despedido

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job.
And I just... I felt really bad for him.
But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.es: Pero le dije que tú y yo lo íbamos a ayudar a pensar qué hacer.

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
translation.es: Estaba ebria y confundida y se acercó para besarme...

translation.en: I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
translation.es: Traté de empujarlo. No hice nada, pero él...

translation.en: He kept coming back stronger.
Finally, I got free.
He begged me to forgive him,
said that he needed help, but I was so scared, and I was confused.
translation.es: Dijo que necesitaba ayuda. El miedo que tenía yo y la confusión...

translation.en: And I threatened to tell you what happened,
but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
translation.es: pero me dijo que se moriría si te enterabas.

translation.en: I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.es: Le dije que te iría mejor si estuviera muerto.

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.es: Quería decirte, pero para cuando te localicé,

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
translation.es: él ya lo había hecho, y estabas destrozada.

translation.en: It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.es: Me partió el corazón. Y no sabía qué hacer. Créeme.

translation.en: No.
No, I'll never trust you again.
Markie.
Don't!
Don't.
Miss Barron,
you're up.
I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.es: Sé que quemaste a esa mujer por el juego.

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.es: Dime dónde verte o esperaré donde vive tu familia

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them.
translation.es: hasta que el juego me haga quemarla.

translation.en: That is quite a threat.
We traced the IP to your laptop.
translation.es: Rastreamos la IP a tu computadora.

translation.en: I know that that looks bad,
translation.es: Ya sé que eso se ve mal,

translation.en: but I just needed to get her attention.
Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game,
but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
translation.es: pero no entiendo por qué está muriendo gente.

translation.en: There's only four of you left.
I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.es: Quedan tú, Markie y Lucas y el amigo de Giselle, Sam Meehan.

translation.en: Sam?
Wait. He's alive?
You know him?
No. No.
That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
translation.es: Está metido en un apartamento. Aislado.

translation.en: Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.es: Dijo que lo arrestara si quería hablar con él.

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
Could I get some water, please?
Thanks.
Officer, I need a glass of water.
- - Yes, sir, right away.
translation.es: INFORME DE ARRESTO Sí, señor, enseguida.

translation.en: Am I being charged?
translation.es: ¿Va a presentar cargos en mi contra?

translation.en: Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
Carter is Sam.
He was using a fake name.
But Giselle acted like they were different people?
translation.es: ¿Y Giselle hablaba como si fueran dos tipos?

translation.en: Well, she was probably trying to protect him,
but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.es: pero metió la pata y usó su nombre. Vámonos.

translation.en: Markie? Markie?
Markie!
Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
translation.es: Por favor, abre la puerta. Necesitamos hablar.

translation.en: What are you doing?
What my father did.
Markie, please put it down.
Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
No.
- No, the game has us. -
translation.es: El juego nos tiene a nosotras.

translation.en: I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.es: Te oculté la verdad sobre tu papá para protegerte.

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.es: Todos los días quisiera poder retirar lo que le dije.

translation.en: He tried before.
It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.es: Pero podemos tener un futuro. Podemos terminar el juego.

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
Okay, so what's the plan?
We just have to get him back to the mission.
translation.es: Hay que llevarlo a la misión.

translation.en: Okay, so don't open with, We need you to cut out your own tongue?
translation.es: Entonces, mejor no le digas: Necesitamos que te cortes la lengua.

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
translation.es: Largo. No quiero hablar con nadie.

translation.en: Screw this.
- You... - Carter!
Or is it Sam?
- How did you find me? - We were motivated.
- What the hell happened in here? - The game.
No contact with the outside. Nothing in here can hurt me.
translation.es: Nada de contacto con el exterior. Ni de cosas dañinas.

translation.en: This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
No, that was your second plan.
translation.es: No, ese era tu segundo plan.

translation.en: Your first plan was to screw us.
Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
translation.es: ¡Tres de mis mejores amigos han muerto por tu culpa!

translation.en: I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay?
translation.es: Perdón. Yo también he perdido amigos.

translation.en: If I could take it all back, I would.
There is a way.
But we all have to go back to the mission.
A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
Just trust me.
We have to go back.
Uh- uh...
No, this is another dare, right?
The game is daring you to lure me out.
- Is that-- - No.
She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing.
We wanna survive.
Look.
I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.es: te diré lo que deberías haberme dicho.

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
translation.es: La amable Olivia no mata a nadie.

translation.en: Try me. I dare you.
Come on. Let's go.
Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
translation.es: ¿Servirá el ritual que te dijo la monja?

translation.en: There's only one way to find out.
translation.es: Solo hay una manera de saber.

translation.en: So we're gonna end this with a seance?
We are not ending it.
You are.
Me?
I tried.
We all know how that turned out.
- Stay down. -
Here, take this. Take it.
Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
translation.es: Ahora di las palabras siete veces.

translation.en: Go!
Did you feel that?
Don't stop.
- Just tell me what's going on! - Keep going!
All right. Uh, uh...
Say it again.
Five more times.
Truth or dare, Lucas?
Dare.
- Where are you going? - Just gotta get away from here.
Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
translation.es: No te puedes ir. Te va a tocar a ti.

translation.en: I just had my turn.
- Gotta get away from you both. - Why?
Because it dared me to choose.
You already have. You love Markie! Choose which one of you to kill.
translation.es: - Ya escogiste. ¡Amas a Markie! - Escoger a cuál matar.

translation.en: Luke.
What, so he's just leaving? Don't stop. Two more times.
translation.es: - ¿Se va a ir y ya? - No pares. Dos veces más.

translation.en: Luke! Luke!
Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
translation.es: Para que no tuvieran que hacerlo ustedes.

translation.en: And we're so close.
And I won't let the game kill you.
You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
That's seven. We gotta get out of here. This place is coming down.
translation.es: Ya fueron siete. Vámonos. Se viene abajo.

translation.en: No, there's one more thing to do.
Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam.
But you unleashed this evil,
which means you're the only one who can stop it.
I need you to cut out your tongue.
No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
You take care of each other.
No!
No. No, no, no.
No, no!
Do it.
Lucas, stop!
That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter!
- - Before it's too late.
translation.es: O va a ser demasiado tarde.

translation.en: Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
translation.es: No puedo creer que voy a hacer esto.

translation.en: I will murder everyone you've ever known.
No! They are not in this. It's just us!
You're right. But Lucas is.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Pero Lucas sí y no hizo su reto.

translation.en: And he didn't do his dare.
translation.es: Pero Lucas sí y no hizo su reto.

translation.en: So now he dies.
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
translation.es: Lucas no hizo su reto para salvarnos.

translation.en: We have to finish this.
Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.es: Calux mató a Carter. El hechizo no dará resultado.

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
translation.es: No, perdimos tan pronto empezamos el juego.

translation.en: The second we came here.
Carter was dared to bring us here because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.es: Carter nos trajo porque aquí entra gente al juego.

translation.en: I have an idea.
Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
translation.es: Te va a tocar a ti. Escoge reto.

translation.en: Why would I do that?
Markie...
Truth or dare?
Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare.
But don't do it.
What? I'll die!
Markie,
I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.es: Perdóname por haber guardado el secreto tanto tiempo.

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
translation.es: Y te juro que jamás volveré a ocultarte nada.

translation.en: But we survive this only if we trust each other.
translation.es: Pero para vivir, debes confiar en mí y yo en ti.

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Trust me.
You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
translation.es: Te reto a darle un balazo a Olivia.

translation.en: He wants me to shoot you.
translation.es: Quiere que te dé un tiro.

translation.en: You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
translation.es: Confía en mí. No lo hagas.

translation.en: This is the only way to save us both.
translation.es: Solo así nos vamos a salvar.

translation.en: Okay.
I trust you.
I won't do it.
No!
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn.
Truth or dare?
I'm not in this game.
No, once you're asked, you're in.
Those are the rules, right?
So truth or dare, asshole?
Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
You can't.
Carter was the only one who could stop this.
So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.es: Ahora el juego no parará hasta que todos los jugadores mueran.

translation.en: And your turn's next.
Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.es: A menos que encuentres nuevos amigos que jueguen.

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
Your arm.
I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over.
The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.es: El juego no se acabará mientras sigamos vivas.

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico  for spring break.
translation.es: Mis amigos y yo nos fuimos de vacaciones a México.

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
translation.es: Acabamos en una vieja misión jugando a verdad o reto.

translation.en: We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil
translation.es: No sabíamos que nos habíamos topado con un mal inimaginable

translation.en: that wanted to play with us.
When we went home, the game kept going.
translation.es: Cuando nos fuimos a casa, el juego siguió.

translation.en: It killed five of my friends.
translation.es: Mató a cinco de mis amigos.

translation.en: The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die.
translation.es: Di la verdad, haz el reto o morirás.

translation.en: Refuse to play, you die.
translation.es: Si te niegas a jugar, morirás.

translation.en: It can happen anywhere.
And it can come from anyone.
I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
Truth or dare?
